info.title: Ánarsáme
Inarisaamen oikaisuluin
Enaresamisk stavningskontrol
Inari Sámi spell-checking
info.description: This is an fst-based speller for Inari Sami. It is based on the normative subset of the morphological analyser for Inari Sami. The source code can be found at: https://victorio.uit.no/langtech/trunk/langs/smn/ License: GPL3+.

acceptor.title: Giellatekno/Divvun/UiT dictionary Inari Sami
acceptor.description: Giellatekno/Divvun/UiT dictionary for Inari Sami compiled for HFST.

errmodel.title: Levenshtein edit distance transducer
errmodel.description: Correction model for keyboard misstrokes, at most 2 per word.
